column4: ok, what about a new question?  Does anyone here know the  best place to download the latest point release for quake iii? since I can't get firefox to download it from official sources, maybe i should just ask the question that started my whole mess. :)
do you have a link to the page where you are trying to download it from?

yes. the problem is that when I click 'download', it tries to load it in the browser window instead of downloading the file. everyone here has been trying to help me figure out a way to download .run files but no luck yet
they've suggested using wget but i can't because the ftp requires authentication i don't have, and we've tried changing ff settings
i thought of that but it won't load completely usually.  and in cases with very larg efiles, it crashes ff. so i was trying to find a more stable way to do it
is that really the only way to download .run files? is that how everyone else does it?
stop it before it even loads
its a problem with the server they didnt set the mime type correctly
but every site i've ever tried to download a .run file (like for enemy territory for example) it has the same behavior.  and ok i'll try to stop the load... it's always crashed when i tried
it says "page cannot be saved link may have moved... yadda" i can't save-as if it's not loaded all the way in the browser
hold on I am trying to download it
